attributes.action: England have a Referendum whether Scotland should remain  in the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: This would certainly help to bring  decision to the current BREXIT situation.
attributes.background:
A majority of the Scottish people voted in 2016 to stay in the EU.
England reference the same referendum voted in a majority to leave the EU.

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for the people of Scotland rather than the UK Government or Parliament. 

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/259359
